root.name: 3D Mesh ROI
root.description: SDK for 3D ROI creation and manipulation using polygonal (surface) and polyhedral (volume) meshes.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.2.6.0 Date 2017-09-20 09:36:48
Fixed an issue when displaying 3D meshes on a 2D canvas
- Version 1.2.5.0 Date 2017-02-10 10:55:22
